main.name: Jay Sarmiento
main.description: I am a junior web designer and game developer
main.bio: I'm extremely passionate about the arts and strive to learn different ways to solve real world problems with virtual solutions. I've worked in numerous teams to accomplish my goals moving forward with my web apps.
main.contactmessage: Please feel free to contact me.
